actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to enhance and extend authority relating  to energy savings performance contracts of the Federal Government.
short_title: Energy Efficient Cost Savings Improvement Act of 2001

summary.text: Energy Efficient Cost Savings Improvement Act of 2001 - Amends the National Energy Conservation Policy Act with respect to Federal energy savings performance contracts to redefine "energy savings" and "energy savings contract" to include a reduction in the cost of energy by reason of construction and operation of replacement Federal buildings and facilities.Prescribes guidelines for cost-savings from operation and maintenance efficiencies in replacement facilities.Extends from October 1, 2003, to October 1, 2008, the authority to enter into Federal energy savings performance contracts.

titles.title: Energy Efficient Cost Savings Improvement Act of 2001
A bill to amend the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to enhance and extend authority relating  to energy savings performance contracts of the Federal Government.
